Escape to Wasaga Beach

Welcome to Riverscape, a modern townhome community offering the perfect blend of tranquility and convenience. Nestled in a private enclave, Riverscape is surrounded by nature, providing a retreat in modern townhomes that are designed with stone and wood architectural detailing.

REGISTER

ESCAPE TO WASAGA BEACH

Located in Wasaga Beach, Riverscape provides the best of both worlds. Enjoy city life with easy access to all the amenities and city conveniences, yet experience the cottage lifestyle in this laid-back beach town, with a natural landscape, riverfront property and nature trails. The Wasaga lifestyle provides access to the best of Wasaga Beach, including boutique stores, beachfront restaurants, and of course, the beach itself. You are also within close proximity to the attractions of nearby Collingwood and Barrie. Embrace the perfect balance of serene living and vibrant community life at Riverscape.

REGISTER TODAY

Imagine modern townhomes, designed around nature for an urban lifestyle. Three contemporary collections, Bungaloft Towns, Linx Towns and Traditional Towns, offer spacious open concept designs, sleek kitchens and primary bedrooms with bungalow lofts.

Brought to you by Upperview Homes, building fine quality homes in Ontario for over 10 years.
